description: Mentioned only in passing by Audsley, who says: [Clarin] is labeled in Spanish organs with several qualifications as follows: Clarin Real, Clarin de Batalla, Clarin Claro, Clarin Sordino, Clarin Pardo, Clarin de Bajos, and Clarin de Ecos. The word pardo means �dark�.
examplesDescription: Clarin Pardo 8' [en chamade], manual right; Parroquia de San Salvador, Lacunza, Navarra, Spain; Juan Amezua, Azpeita, Nagarra 1857.
